phrs.translation: 可逮捕的, 应予逮捕的英语, 逮捕, 应该被拘留的
翻译, 应予逮捕的罪犯

sentences.sentence: Possession of cannabis will no longer be an arrestable offence.
sentences.translation: 持有大麻将不再会被拘捕。

sentences.sentence: Wandering with intent to commit an arrestable offence, ' he said.
sentences.translation: 我问。 彷徨意图犯可逮捕的罪行，他说。

sentences.sentence: Vienna is all about music, so it would be an arrestable offence not to hear Strauss and Mozart here.
sentences.translation: 维也纳的一切与音乐有关，所以在这里不听斯特劳斯和莫扎特是说不过去的。
